string-array.name: application_modules_desc_array
string-array.item: Easy to see schedule and created task.
Easy to see schedule and created ticket.
Real-time and structured incident reports with audio, photo and video.
Guard tours are scheduled and assigned to the user individually or based on group the user belongs to
Keep track of surveyors or auditors geographical location in real-­time
Easy creation and management of large number of sites and workforce records.

resources.string: 對不起，Android相機遇到了問題。您可能需要重新開機設備。
在取景器矩形內放置條碼進行掃描。
Google Shopper無需打開流覽器即可用條碼掃描來合併線上和本地價格，評論等。你想試試嗎？
抱歉，無法啟動請求的應用程式。條碼內容可能無效。
這是我掃描的條碼的內容
根據您的消息歷史記錄建議連絡人
已違規了 ％1$s 的地理圍欄。
UPDATE asset SET mdtz=now(), muser= %1$d ,runningstatus=\'%2$d\' where assetcode= \'%3$s\' returning *
UPDATE jobneeddetails SET answer =\'%1$s\' where jndid = %2$d returning *
select sp.*, b.buid, b.bucode, b.buname from sitepeople sp INNER JOIN bu b on b.buid=sp.buid where peopleid=%1$d and now() between fromdt and uptodt
我們的熱線隨時歡迎任何詢問或回饋。請隨時從表格中給我們發送電子郵件，我們會儘快回復您
許可未獲批准，請授予許可
任務詳細資料下載失敗
資產輔助主資料下載失敗
地理圍欄詳細資料下載失敗
考勤歷史主資料下載失敗
問題集主資料下載失敗
問題集主資料下載失敗
員工所屬組主數據下載失敗
人員事件日誌上傳失敗
設備事件日誌上載失敗
工作需要日誌上傳失敗
工作需要回復日誌上傳失敗
工作需要日誌上傳失敗
select * from qsetbelonging inner join question q on qsetbelonging.questionid=q.questionid where questionsetid= %1$d order by qsetbelonging.seqno ASC

select qs.questionsetid,q.questionname,q.questionid,q.type,q.unit,q.cuser,q.cdtz,q.muser,q.mdtz, qs.assetid, qsb.min, qsb.max, qsb.option, qsb.seqno, qsb.alerton, qsb.ismandatory,q.alerton from questionset qs inner join qsetbelonging qsb on qsb.questionsetid= qs.questionsetid inner join question q on qsb.questionid = q.questionid where qs.questionsetid= %1$d order by qsb.seqno ASC
SELECT qsetname FROM questionset WHERE questionsetid= %1$d
SELECT qs.questionsetid, qs.qsetname,qs.seqno, ta.taname FROM questionset qs INNER JOIN typeassist ta ON ta.taid=qs.type AND ta.tacode=\'INCIDENTREPORTTEMPLATE\' WHERE qs.parent=-1 AND qs.buid = %1$d
SELECT qs.questionsetid, qs.qsetname,qs.seqno, ta.taname FROM questionset qs INNER JOIN typeassist ta ON ta.taid=qs.type AND ta.tacode=\'SITEREPORTTEMPLATE\' WHERE qs.parent=-1 AND qs.buid = %1$d
SELECT qs.questionsetid, qs.qsetname,qs.seqno FROM questionset qs WHERE qs.questionsetid in( %1$s )

SELECT qs.questionsetid, qs.qsetname,qs.seqno FROM questionset qs INNER JOIN typeassist ta ON ta.taid=qs.type AND ta.tacode=\'QUESTIONSET\' and tatype=\'Question Set Type\' WHERE qs.questionsetid IN( %1$s )

SELECT qs.questionsetid, qs.qsetname,qs.seqno, qs.type, ta.taname FROM questionset qs INNER JOIN typeassist ta ON ta.taid=qs.type AND ta.tacode=\'ASSETMAINTENANCE\' AND tatype=\'Question Set Type\' WHERE qs.questionsetid in( %1$s )

SELECT qs.questionsetid, qs.qsetname,qs.seqno, qs.type, ta.taname FROM questionset qs INNER JOIN typeassist ta ON ta.taid=qs.type AND ta.tacode=\'CHECKLIST\' AND tatype=\'Question Set Type\' WHERE qs.questionsetid in( %1$s )
SELECT distinct qs.questionsetid, qs.qsetname,qs.seqno, qsb.questionsetid FROM questionset qs INNER JOIN qsetbelonging qsb ON qsb.questionsetid=qs.questionsetid WHERE qs.parent=%1$d order by qs.seqno
無法從GPS資料中提取位址，請手動輸入位址

Please proceed with site CHECK_OUT for %1$s

select count(*) from questionset qs inner join qsetbelonging qsb on qsb.questionsetid= qs.questionsetid inner join question q on qsb.questionid = q.questionid where qs.questionsetid= %1$d order by qsb.seqno ASC

SELECT qs.questionsetid, qs.qsetname,qs.seqno, qs.type, ta.taname FROM questionset qs INNER JOIN typeassist ta ON ta.taid=qs.type AND ta.tacode=\'ASSETAUDIT\' AND tatype=\'Question Set Type\' ORDER BY qs.seqno ASC
